children.name: Welcome to Planalittle.com (“we”, “our”, “us”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled securely. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose information that we obtain about visitors to our website and users of our SaaS product (“Service”).
We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that we collect automatically when you use our Service.

1. Personal Information: When you create an account, subscribe to our Service, or contact us for support, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.
: When you create an account, subscribe to our Service, or contact us for support, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.

2. OAuth Authentication: To facilitate seamless login and access, we use OAuth for authentication. This process allows you to log in using third-party services such as but not limited to Google, Zoom, Outlook or Facebook without sharing your login credentials with us.

: To facilitate seamless login and access, we use OAuth for authentication. This process allows you to log in using third-party services such as but not limited to Google, Zoom, Outlook or Facebook without sharing your login credentials with us.

3. SMS and Email Communication: We may use your phone number and email address to send you account-related notifications, updates, and promotional messages. You can opt-out of promotional communications at any time.
: We may use your phone number and email address to send you account-related notifications, updates, and promotional messages. You can opt-out of promotional communications at any time.

4. Integrations: Our Service offers integrations with various third-party applications (e.g., project management tools, communication platforms). When you enable these integrations, we may collect information from these third-party services as necessary to provide the integration functionality.

: Our Service offers integrations with various third-party applications (e.g., project management tools, communication platforms). When you enable these integrations, we may collect information from these third-party services as necessary to provide the integration functionality.

5. Usage Data: We automatically collect information about your use of our Service, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, device information, and pages visited. This data helps us understand how our Service is being used and improve its performance.

: We automatically collect information about your use of our Service, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, device information, and pages visited. This data helps us understand how our Service is being used and improve its performance.
We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
• To provide, maintain, and improve our Service.
To provide, maintain, and improve our Service.
• To process your transactions and manage your account.
To process your transactions and manage your account.
• To communicate with you, including sending updates, security alerts, and promotional messages.
To communicate with you, including sending updates, security alerts, and promotional messages.
• To provide customer support and respond to your inquiries.
To provide customer support and respond to your inquiries.
• To analyze usage patterns and improve our Service.
To analyze usage patterns and improve our Service.
We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
• Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, email delivery, and customer support.
: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, email delivery, and customer support.
• Integrations: When you enable third-party integrations, we may share relevant information with the third-party application to facilitate the integration.
: When you enable third-party integrations, we may share relevant information with the third-party application to facilitate the integration.
• Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

We take the security of your information seriously and implement appropriate measures to protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.

You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can do this by logging into your account or contacting us directly. You also have the right to opt-out of receiving promotional communications.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website and updating the effective date.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at info@planalittle.com.
